attributes.action: stop the electoral reform society from trying to influence political elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the electoral reform society are trying to alter the voting system in our country so that it only benefits mainstream politics , this needs to be stopped in its tracks , this is a democratic country and needs to remain so without being turned into a dictatorship.
vote now to help stop it happening

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
